result.adr_address: Epitsentr K, Polyarna St, 20Д, Kyiv, Ukraine, 04201
result.formatted_address: Epitsentr K, Polyarna St, 20Д, Kyiv, Ukraine, 04201
result.name: Food market эпицентр

reviews.text: We didn't get to try the coffee, because we waited 5 minutes for the blonde at the cash register to scan something as if from suppliers. We got zero response to our "Good afternoon", no greetings, no "please wait". The customer focus is terrible.

I had lunch at this place more than once, it was delicious, but the last visit was very disappointing. My friend and I had dinner yesterday with consequences. The first thing that did not really contribute to a good mood was a rather long wait in line, more than 20 minutes. The second is feeling unwell after dinner there. Both me and my friend had a feeling of heaviness and the impression that the stomach stopped. In the evening, the temperature rose to 38 degrees, the stomach ached and diarrhea began. Therefore, I have a very big question about sanitation in this institution. It is unlikely that I will dare to eat there again (((

Standing in line without a number (absolutely unnecessary), about which no one informs in advance, no one will serve, and if you walk a couple of meters behind the number, you lose your place in the queue and the woman at the counter pretends that you were not there, even if you have already ordered . In addition, they are rude or simply do not pay attention. It is better to bypass this place. Terrible service and staff

I put this place on the map because I couldn't find it in Google maps. The establishment is interesting and colorful, but it has its “buts”.
The interior design is a blast, no doubt, for a dining room it’s 5*, but the staff is 3* 4*, tortured workers of the epicenter. I have no doubt about the quality of the food in the kitchen; I have eaten here more than once. But I began to doubt the cleanliness of the kitchen and the cleanliness of the hands of the staff who prepare this food (due to the fact that my 2 friends ate there and were sitting on the toilet for the second day)

We had dinner here 2 times, none of them were tasty, warm, or friendly!
The service is terrible, the food is terrible, the blonde behind the bar is terrible, the coffee is terrible, I didn't like anything!
